views.markdown:
This is a free version of "Fake GPS", the most popular location spoofing tweak for iDevice, compatible with all devices from 5.1.1 to 12 .

这是业界鼎鼎大名的【定位修改器】的免费版，本应用支持5.1.1-12的所有设备。

Fake GPS is an app with which you can fake your iPhone/iPad's current location as you wish. After setting a fake location with just a long press on a map view, all location-based apps(like Facebook, Twitter, Line, Wechat, etc)on your device immediately believe you are where you set.

定位修改器可以让你随心所欲地修改您的iPhone定位。只需一个长按操作，您手机上的微信、微博、陌陌等等就会把你设置的任何位置当做你的真实位置了。

It is really a perfect match for Facebook, Twitter, Line, Tinder and other location-based apps. By changing your location, you can:
1. Protect your location privacy from people on SNS sites.
2. Get around the location specific locks that some apps put in place to prevent you from viewing content in certain regions.
3. Go where you've never been before, and meet people there, in a second.
4. Promote your products on LBS apps to people anywhere you like.

利用定位修改器，你可以：
1. 随意修改定位，让你微博，微信上的朋友以为你现在在纽约，在非洲，甚至在南极玩企鹅（当然还可以哄骗你的男友女友）。
2. 你可以交到偷偷设置到世界任何一个角落，与那里的人打个招呼。
3. 可以让你的微博，微信营销工作事半功倍。将推广做到任意区域，不费力。

support all iOS versions(5.1.1~12.4), and all iOS devices(iPhone 4/4S/5/5S/5C/6/6+/6S/6S+/7/7+/SE/8/8+/X/XR/Xs/Max)。支持所有iOS系统(5.1.1~12.4)版本及设备(包括iPhone 4/4S/5/5S/5C/6/6+/6S/6S+/7/7+/SE/8/8+/X/XR/Xs/Max), iPad, iPod Touch. 完美兼容最新12.4越狱

Contact tinyapps@qq.com anytime you need
任何问题，请联系

2. add mark time for favorite locations.

1. 增加收藏条目置顶功能
2. 增加显示收藏时间
1. support iOS 9
1. 支持iOS 9

修复在6 plus上的导航栏高度奇怪的问题

support iOS 8.4
兼容iOS 8.4完美越狱，支持5.1.1-8.4的所有iOS设备。
